domain

Class TreeRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.TreeRepresentation

  • public class TreeRepresentation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a canonical Huffman tree. The second part (called "symbols") of this representation contains all symbols in canonical order (so firstly by bit-length of their codeword, and secondly by alphabetical order); the first part (called "codewordLengths") contains the number of symbols for each bit-length. See Wikipedia for more details: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canonical_Huffman_code#Encoding_the_codebook .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TreeRepresentation(byte[] compressedData)
      Returns an instance of TreeRepresentation built from array compressedData (given as a parameter).
      TreeRepresentation(HuffNode[] leafNodes)
      Returns an instance of TreeRepresentation corresponding to the Huffman tree whose leaves are found in array leafNodes (given as parameter).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HuffNode[] buildLeafNodes()
      Returns an array containing the leaves of the Huffman tree this is a representation of.
      byte[] getBytes()
      Returns the byte array used internally to store this tree representation.
      int getCodewordLengthsLength()
      Returns the length (in bytes) of the first part of this tree representation, where the counts for each codeword length are stored.
      int getTotalLength()
      Returns the total length (in bytes) of this tree representation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreeRepresentation

        public TreeRepresentation(HuffNode[] leafNodes)
        Returns an instance of TreeRepresentation corresponding to the Huffman tree whose leaves are found in array leafNodes (given as parameter).
        Parameters:
        leafNodes - Leaves of the Huffman tree of which we want a representation; this array must be sorted in canonical order (so firstly by bit-length of their codeword, and secondly by alphabetical order; see the HuffNode class for more info).

      • TreeRepresentation

        public TreeRepresentation(byte[] compressedData)
        Returns an instance of TreeRepresentation built from array compressedData (given as a parameter).
        Parameters:
        compressedData - Array used to build the tree representation. It must have been encoded by the Huffman class.

    • Method Detail

      • buildLeafNodes

        public HuffNode[] buildLeafNodes()
        Returns an array containing the leaves of the Huffman tree this is a representation of.
        Returns:
        Leaves (HuffNodes) of the Huffman tree this is a representation of.

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        Returns the byte array used internally to store this tree representation.
        Returns:
        Array used internally to store this tree representation.

      • getCodewordLengthsLength

        public int getCodewordLengthsLength()
        Returns the length (in bytes) of the first part of this tree representation, where the counts for each codeword length are stored.
        Returns:
        Length (in bytes) of the first part of this tree representation, where the counts for each codeword length are stored.

      • getTotalLength

        public int getTotalLength()
        Returns the total length (in bytes) of this tree representation.
        Returns:
        Total length (in bytes) of this tree representation (equal to getBytes().length).
